bone_segmentation.title: DICOM to glb generation
bone_segmentation.name: Generic bone segmentation
bone_segmentation.description: This pipeline utilises a marching cube algorithm to generate a 3D model from a series of CT scans. As it performs the segmentation based on Hounsfield units, it is agnostic to the specific body site.

lung_segmentation.title: DICOM to segmented lung GLB generation
lung_segmentation.name: Lungs segmentation
lung_segmentation.info: Generate segmented lungs (without air way) glb mesh from dicom
lung_segmentation.description: This pipeline segments the lungs and the airway from a series of CT scans.

abdominal_organs_segmentation.title: DICOM to segmented abdomen organs GLB generation
abdominal_organs_segmentation.info: Generate 3D models (8 in total) for the organs in the abdomen region
abdominal_organs_segmentation.description: Generate 3D models (8 in total) for the organs in the abdomen region
